name: Laseronium: The Line
detailed_description:
This is a game connected with physics, so if you're not into optics and that kind of stuff this isn't a game for you! Just kidding - this is a game for everyone!

THE GOAL
Your goal in every level is to imagine a straight line that bounces of the edges of objects causing reflection. In that way, you will get that laser line to eventually hit its goal and you pass that level. Sometimes you need to try and solve one piece of the level after another because the line could get very very long before hitting the goal.

More complex patterns, more abstrack thinking required. Good luck!
